concept.definition: For the total term, lifetime, of the policy or coverage

description: This value set includes a smattering of Benefit Term codes.
name: Benefit Term Codes

text.div:
Benefit Term Codes

This value set includes a smattering of Benefit Term codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/benefit-term defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
annual AnnualAnnual, renewing on the anniversary
day DayPer day
lifetime LifetimeFor the total term, lifetime, of the policy or coverage
